metadata.description: Remote desktop user password. Must be a strong password
Name for the storage account that contains application diagnostics data from the cluster
Replication option for the VM image storage account
Refers to the location URL in your key vault where the certificate was uploaded, it is should be in the format of https://<name of the vault>.vault.azure.net:443/secrets/<exact location>
Name of your cluster - Between 3 and 23 characters. Letters and numbers only

Production workloads require a durability level of Silver or Gold to help avoid data loss from VM-level infrastructure requests. https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/service-fabric/service-fabric-cluster-capacity
Production workloads require a reliability level of Silver or greater (more than 5 nodes). https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/service-fabric/service-fabric-cluster-capacity
Resource Id of the key vault, is should be in the format of /subscriptions/<Sub ID>/resourceGroups/<Resource group name>/providers/Microsoft.KeyVault/vaults/<vault name>
Name for the storage account that contains support logs from the cluster
Replication option for the VM image storage account
